title: New: Dios Mio – Stories
body:
Am I the only one who thinks that the opening few seconds of this new track from Dios Mio feels like it could be a Puddle Of Mud track? Okay, maybe just me.

Thankfully, it’s far better than that comparison would have you believe. This London quartet write bold, anthemic pop, with a real hearts on sleeves honesty to it. Check out Stories below.
